panels.title: Detailed table view (aggregated table statistics)
Size stats
Top $top_n tables by total size
Top $top_n tables by size growth /s
Top $top_n tables by heap size (excl. TOAST)
Top $top_n tables by heap size growth /s
Top $top_n tables by TOAST size
Top $top_n tables by TOAST size growth /s
Top $top_n tables by indexes size
Top $top_n tables by indexes size growth /s
Activity stats

targets.expr: topk($top_n, sum by(schema, table_name, table_full_name) (irate(pgwatch_table_stats_n_tup_ins{datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name", schema=~"$schema_name"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: Top $top_n tables by tuple inserts per second

targets.expr: topk($top_n, sum by(schema, table_name, table_full_name) (irate(pgwatch_table_stats_n_tup_del{datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name", schema=~"$schema_name"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: Top $top_n tables by tuple deletes per second

targets.expr: topk($top_n, sum by(schema, table_name, table_full_name) (irate(pgwatch_table_stats_n_tup_hot_upd{datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name", schema=~"$schema_name"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: Top $top_n tables by tuple HOT updates per second

targets.expr: topk($top_n, sum by(schema, table_name, table_full_name) (irate(pgwatch_table_stats_n_tup_upd{datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name", schema=~"$schema_name"}[$__rate_interval]) - irate(pgwatch_table_stats_n_tup_hot_upd{datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name", schema=~"$schema_name"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: Top $top_n tables by tuple non-HOT updates per second
Top $top_n tables by sequential reads of live tuples
Top $top_n tables by index fetches of live tuples
IO stats

targets.expr:
topk($top_n, 
  irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_heap_blks_hit{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
  irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_idx_blks_hit{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
  irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_toast_blks_hit{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
  irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_tidx_blks_hit{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval])
) * on() group_left() last_over_time(pgwatch_settings_numeric_value{datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name", setting_name="block_size"}[1d])

panels.title: Top $top_n tables by total shared block hits

targets.expr:
topk($top_n, 
  (irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_heap_blks_hit{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
  irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_idx_blks_hit{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
  irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_toast_blks_hit{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
  irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_tidx_blks_hit{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]))/(irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_heap_blks_read{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
  irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_idx_blks_read{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
  irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_toast_blks_read{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
  irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_tidx_blks_read{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + (irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_heap_blks_hit{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
  irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_idx_blks_hit{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
  irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_toast_blks_hit{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
  irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_tidx_blks_hit{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]))) 
)

panels.title: Top $top_n tables by total shared block hit ratio

targets.expr:
topk($top_n, irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_heap_blks_read{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_idx_blks_read{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_toast_blks_read{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_tidx_blks_read{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval])) * on() group_left() last_over_time(pgwatch_settings_numeric_value{datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name", setting_name="block_size"}[1d])

panels.title: Top $top_n tables by total shared block reads

targets.expr:
topk($top_n, 
  (irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_heap_blks_read{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
  irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_idx_blks_read{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
  irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_toast_blks_read{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
  irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_tidx_blks_read{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]))/(irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_heap_blks_read{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
  irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_idx_blks_read{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
  irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_toast_blks_read{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
  irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_tidx_blks_read{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + (irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_heap_blks_hit{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
  irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_idx_blks_hit{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
  irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_toast_blks_hit{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + 
  irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_tidx_blks_hit{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name"}[$__rate_interval]))) 
)
